code: import theme from'./theme';var media=Object.keys(theme.mediaSizes).reduce(function(all,key){if(theme.mediaSizes[key].values.length===2){all[key]="@media only screen and (min-width: ".concat(theme.mediaSizes[key].values[0],") and (max-width: ").concat(theme.mediaSizes[key].values[1],")");}else{all[key]="@media only screen and (".concat(theme.mediaSizes[key].selector,": ").concat(theme.mediaSizes[key].values,")");}return all;},{});export default media;
